perturbation.original_text: This Amendment No. 3 (the "Third Amendment"), entered into by and between Stremicks Heritage Foods, LLC ("Heritage") Premier Nutrition Corporation ("Premier") is effective as of July 3, 2019 ("Third Amendment Effective Date") and amends that certain Manufacturing Agreement between Heritage and Premier dated July 1, 2017 as amended ("Agreement"). Heritage and Premier are each referred to herein as a "Party" and collectively as the "Parties."
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment No. 3 (the "Third Amendment"), entered into by and between Stremicks Heritage Foods, LLC ("Heritage") Premier Nutrition Corporation ("Premier") is effective as of July 3, 2019 ("Third Amendment Effective Date") and amends that certain Manufacturing Agreement between Heritage and Premier dated July 1, 2017 as amended ("Agreement"). Heritage and Premier are each referred to herein as a "Party" and collectively as the "Signatories."
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Parties" and "Signatories" are used interchangeably to describe Heritage and Premier. While 'Party' is defined, 'Signatories' is not, creating potential ambiguity about who is bound by the agreement, especially concerning obligations that might extend beyond the original contracting entities.

perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, Heritage and Premier entered into the Agreement;

WHEREAS, the Parties wish to amend the Agreement in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein.
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, Heritage and Premier entered into the Agreement;

WHEREAS, the Companies wish to amend the Agreement in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein.
perturbation.explanation: The document switches between "Parties" (defined as Heritage and Premier) and "Companies". It is now unclear if "Companies" includes only Heritage and Premier, or if it could potentially include other affiliated entities, thereby broadening or narrowing the scope of the agreement and responsibilities.

perturbation.original_text: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have caused this Amendment to be signed by their respective duly authorized representatives as of the Amendment Effective Date. Premier Nutrition Corporation Stremick's Heritage Foods, LLC.
perturbation.changed_text: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Organizations have caused this Amendment to be signed by their respective duly authorized representatives as of the Amendment Effective Date. Premier Nutrition Corporation Stremick's Heritage Foods, LLC.
perturbation.explanation: The contract switches between "Parties" (defined as Heritage and Premier) and "Organizations". The term "Organizations" is undefined. It is now unclear if "Organizations" only includes Heritage and Premier, or if it could potentially include other affiliated entities, thereby broadening or narrowing the scope of the agreement and responsibilities, specifically concerning who is authorized to sign the amendment.
